author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: Bitcoin Treasury Corp Boosts Holdings to 771 BTC, Plans Lending After $51M Buy
description: The Toronto-listed firm plans to use its 771 Bitcoin trove for institutional lending and liquidity services.
content:
Bitcoin Treasury Corporation, a Canadian firm focused on bitcoin-related services, has wrapped up the first leg of its bitcoin buying campaign, adding 478.57 bitcoin
